issue.title: [Java][Dataset] Update documentation with latest Dataset changes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17789](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17789). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update documentation with latest Dataset changes (orc/csv):
 \* Add info about batch size argument for Parquet / ORC / CSV
 \* Add latest support for ORC / CSV
